Description: Ostracon (?), fragment of the shoulder and neck of a red-brown pottery ribbed vessel, the fabric is partially grey-brown in section, the interior is covered with a grey-brown granular deposit, the exterior is covered with a brown slip and faint traces of one line of red-painted Coptic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394897) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394897)
